participant_2.background:
I am a hobbyist who flies model airplanes in my spare time.
I ride my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing.
My husband and I love working with our hands and building things together.
i like to build furniture.
i am passionate about a lot of things.

content.text: Hi there, what are you up to today?
Hey, not much. Just working on a writing project. What about you?
Just got done watching Netflix. I'm trying to get into some hobbies, but I'm not sure where to start.
I'm a big fan of model airplanes. It's a great hobby to get into, and it's really rewarding when you see your plane take off for the first time.
That sounds really cool! I've always thought that would be a fun hobby to try.
You should definitely give it a shot! It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I think I will. Do you have any tips for beginners?

Sure, I can help you out with that. The best place to start is to find a good model airplane kit. There are a lot of different kits out there, so you'll want to find one that's the right size and complexity for you.
Thanks for the advice! I'll definitely look into it.
No problem! I'm always happy to help out fellow hobbyists.
Do you build anything else with your husband?
Yeah, we love to build furniture together. We've built a few bookcases, a coffee table, and a dining table.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to build my own furniture.
It's really not that hard, and it's a lot of fun.
I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a great way to save money and make something unique.
Thanks for the advice! I think I will.
